function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and airflow control leading to poor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on manual control for lighting and dynamic envelope elements may result in suboptimal use of natural light and ventilation, leading to indoor air quality issues and increased risk of airborne disease transmission.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of bacs design and functionalities improvements involves on-site work and potential exposure to contagions.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases within healthcare facilities due to suboptimal building automation and control systems bacs design and functionality.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for contamination in shared ventilation systems","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of hygiene and sanitation in healthcare facilities","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Multiple parameters comprising the iaq category, leading to non-compliance if one parameter exceeds the relevant threshold.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assessment of thermal comfort, lighting, and iaq compliance only during occupied hours 8am -6pm , and acoustic compliance during unoccupied hours 7pm -7am after the air conditioning system has started.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive correlation between respiratory illness and chronic exposure to air pollutants","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of virus fragments in particulate matter","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Association between covid-19 and chronic exposure to air pollution","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Correlation analysis between air pollution and covid-19 variables","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High viral infections in areas with air pollutants","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited systematic covid-19 testing at a national scale in china, leading to exclusion of asymptomatic cases and potentially inflated mortality rates.","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Chronic exposure to air pollution linked to spread of sars-cov-2 in chinese cities.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 as a highly contagious respiratory illness caused by a novel coronavirus","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk factors for fast spread of the virus, including age, gender, and smoking status","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient focus on physical distancing and behavioral modification","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uneven distribution of vaccination","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate vaccination coverage and acceptance in local communities","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of highly active surveillance using who-recommended surveillance case definition","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increasing demand for care of covid-19 patients","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and education","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to lack of access to healthcare","category":"Lack of access to health work environment concerns for remote workers","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of training in covid-19 signs and symptoms, social distancing, and hygiene practices.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Preference for living in gated communities during pandemics may lead to increased concentration of individuals in a confined space, raising the risk of disease spread.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on the gated community environment for safety during pandemics may lead to complacency in implementing broader public health measures.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 in crowded or confined spaces","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19
